label: Confluence
info: Price is near a weekly support and resistance, ema50 and begining of a new trend after a med-high contiuation.
text: level and ema50 and price < 30 and trend >= 2 and rev > 0 and rev <= 1.5

label: RSI Diverge
info: Price is near a weekly support and resistance, and recent RSI divergence.

label: Night Gap
info: Overnight gap near a weekly support and resistance.

label: Candlestick
info: Price is near a weekly support and resistance, and recent RSI divergence.
text: level and ema50 and price < 30 and (dtop or rsi or engulf)

label: Trending
info: These are assets that has been trending daily for a 25 days or more.  Trending is defined by close being above the ema14 and ema50, and ema14 above the ema50.

label: New Trends
info: These asssets has started to reverse.
text: level and rev > 0 and rev <= 1.5 and price < 30
